name: ContentStudioBlog
0:
”Alexa, open content studio blog”
”Alexa, ask content studio blog for the latest update”
”Alexa, start content studio blog”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: content studio blog
des: Listen to the latest blogs posts from GLC's Content Studio blog. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
